name: Max Level Player
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: After 20 grueling years of hellish training, Juhyuk&#039s stats are maxed-out, and he is ready to venture out into Olympus, a virtual reality game. His master&#039s last dying wish is for Juhyuk to be the Ultimate Evil, the most powerful in Olympus. But when he steps out of the tutorial area, every player tries to kill him, and the game forces him to start over from Level 1! With these setbacks, Juhyuk will need all the help he can get to complete his SSS-rank quest and become the next Ultimate
